question:
To cut out spekulatius cookies from the dough

Choices:
A: roll a portion of the dough out flat with your rolling pin, make sure it is an even thickness. Cut out cookie shapes with your cookie cutter.
B: roll a portion of the dough out flat with your rolling pin, make sure it has an uneven thickness. Cut out cookie shapes with your pizza cutter.
steps: To make speculaas cookies, it is important that the dough is rolled out evenly. This ensures that all cookie shapes will bake evenly and have the same texture.
Using a rolling pin to roll the dough flat is the standard method for preparing cookie dough, as it helps achieve an even thickness.
An uneven thickness would result in some cookies being undercooked or overcooked, which is undesirable.
Cookie cutters are specifically designed to cut out shapes from cookie dough, while pizza cutters are not suited for this purpose.
Thus, the best choice for cutting out speculaas cookies from the dough is to use a rolling pin to achieve an even thickness and then use a cookie cutter to create the shapes.
Therefore, the correct answer is A.
